name: wipp/wipp-stardist-inference-plugin
title: WIPP StarDist inference plugin
description: A WIPP Plugin for inferencing using StarDist 3D pretrained demo model
author: Mylene Simon
institution: National Institute of Standards and Technology
citation: Martin Weigert, Uwe Schmidt, Robert Haase, Ko Sugawara, and Gene Myers. Star-convex Polyhedra for 3D Object Detection and Segmentation in Microscopy. The IEEE Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV), Snowmass Village, Colorado, March 2020
